block.p: AMGEN INC., Thousand Oaks, Calif., named Kevin W. Sharer, president and chief operating officer, to the post of chief executive. He succeeds Gordon Binder, who is retiring.

ADOLPH COORS CO., Golden, Colo., named Peter Coors, vice chairman and chief executive at the Coors Brewing division, as president and chief executive at the parent company. He succeeds his uncle, William Coors, who will remain chairman. Peter Coors was also named chairman at the Coors Brewing Co. Leo Kiely, president and chief operating officer at Coors Brewing, was named president and chief executive there.
